content: meet noah a pattern that not only packs bags of texture but at only an 8 row repeat is a relatively simple knit the short repeat makes it the perfect knit to tackle if you ve just mastered knit and purl stitches and want to get to grips with a big project if you are new to following written patterns or if you re more of a visual learner then noah just like all my blanket patterns has a video tutorial that walks you through the entire pattern repeat - i ve linked it at the end of this pattern
